modules.name: MIDI-CC
modules.description: Converts MIDI CC from an external device CV, supports polyphonic output.

modules.name: Signal
modules.description: Frame expander which adds one signal input and output.

modules.name: 4Signal
modules.description: Frame expander which adds four signal inputs and outputs.

modules.name: Play
modules.description: Frame expander which adds midi recording inputs and outputs.

modules.name: FrameX
modules.description: Frame expander which adds additional position and rate controls, as well as control ports. Enables alternative ways to use Frame.

modules.name: Signal
modules.description: Record, loop, edit, playback, and sequence signals.

modules.name: Frame
modules.description: Record, loop, edit, playback, and sequence signals. Designed for adding structure to patches, live loop recording, and more.
